lead_paragraph: The team, as part of a weekend celebrating Piazza’s induction into the Hall of Fame, displayed the jersey he wore when he hit a home run during the first major sporting event held in New York after the attacks of Sept. 11, 2001.

headline.print_headline: The Mets Celebrate a Hall of Famer’s Memorable Moment
headline.main: The Mets Celebrate a Memorable Mike Piazza Moment

snippet: The team, as part of a weekend celebrating Piazza’s induction into the Hall of Fame, displayed the jersey he wore when he hit a home run during the first major sporting event held in New York after the attacks of Sept. 11, 2001....
abstract: Jersey worn by former New York Mets catcher Mike Piazza after Sept 11 terrorist attacks is on display inside Mets Museum at Citi Field as part of weekend celebrations commemorating his induction into Baseball Hall of Fame.
